document.full_text: miami had a 16-0 run over the final 4 minutes 28 seconds, with lebron james scoring the last 10 points of the game, as the heat advanced to the eastern conference finals.
document.title: playoffs | heat 97, celtics 87: heat overcomes the celtics
lines_and_colors: miami had a 16-0 run over the final 4 minutes 28 seconds, with lebron james scoring the last 10 points of the game, as the heat advanced to the eastern conference finals.
